attributes.action: call a General Election for Sunday, May 3rd, 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why is my government is throwing away our human rights by asking venues in London to fill out 'form 696' eg  'We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Scrap the
     unnecessary and draconian usage of the 696 Form from London
     music events.' - why is this kind of thing even being considered by my government? Does the Prime Minister and Parliament NOT know this is a clear breach of our Human Rights (freedom of expression, right to privacy and others), Harriet Harmon was 'proud' to support when she took the last PMQ's before xmas?
is this another reason why we should have a General Election come May 3rd 2009?

rejection.details:
A number of petitions exist calling for elections e.g http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/election09/

Suggest you retitle and resubmit on the specific subject of Form 696 ( perhaps explaining what it is for people reading your petition who may not be aware of it).
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
